title: Almost There!
description: Follow Ed Carper, an average Connecticut working man who is retirement driven. Throw all caution to the wind and take the ride. The twists and curves that lead him on his mishapful journey to what he thinks will be his PERFECT life, his dream of retirement to... Florida!An inspired version of a story that my step dad jotted down before he passed away. Thank you Bob for sharing your wisdom and humor with us while you were here. You are here with us NOW! This story is proof. We thank you. "This one's for you, Bob!"This book is perfect for respite readers. A book at the pool, beach, at the airport, in Florida or up north. A recreational readers fun read!
author: Sandra Marie Hall
